alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 21 at 6:09AM MDT until March 21 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains and East Slopes. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected in the early to mid afternoon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet
